event.descr:
Communication to the UPS has been lost. Steps to reestablish communication are in progress.

mtrapargsString%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: Communication lost between the agent and the UPS

event.descr:
The UPS has sensed a load greater than 100 percent of its rated capacity.

mtrapargsString%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: The UPS has sensed a load greater than 100 percent of its rated capacity.

event.descr:
The UPS failed its internal diagnostic self-test.

mtrapargsString%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: The UPS has failed its internal self-test.

event.descr:
The UPS batteries are discharged; if utility power fails an immediate low battery condition will exist. Sufficient runtime for necessary action cannot be guaranteed.

mtrapargsString%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: The UPS batteries are discharged.

event.descr:
The UPS has switched to battery backup power.

mtrapargsString%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: The UPS is now providing battery backup power.

event.descr:
The UPS has enabled SmartBoost.

mtrapargsString%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: The UPS has enabled SmartBoost.

event.descr:
SEVERE: The UPS batteries are low and will soon be exhausted. If utility power is not restored the UPS will put itself to 'sleep' and immediately cut power to the load.

mtrapargsString%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: The UPS system's batteries are low and will soon be exhausted.

event.descr:
Communication with the UPS has been established.

mtrapargsString%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: Communication established between the agent and the UPS.

event.descr:
Utility power has been restored.

mtrapargsString%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: Normal power has been restored to the UPS.

event.descr:
The UPS passed its internal self-test.

mtrapargsString%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: The UPS passed its internal self-test.

event.descr:
The UPS has returned from a low battery condition.

mtrapargsString%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: The UPS has returned from a low battery condition.

event.descr:
The UPS has been turned 'off' by the management station.

mtrapargsString%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: The UPS is being switched off by a management station.

event.descr:
The UPS is entering 'sleep' mode. Power to the load will be cut off.

mtrapargsString%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: The UPS is going into sleep mode.

event.descr:
INFORMATION: The UPS has returned from 'sleep' mode. Power to the load has been restored.

mtrapargsString%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: The UPS has returned from sleep mode.

event.descr:
The UPS has started its reboot sequence. The UPS will reboot itself at this time.

mtrapargsString%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: The UPS has started its reboot sequence.

event.descr:
WARNING: The dip switch settings on the UPS have been changed, possibly altering UPS performance.

mtrapargsString%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: The DIP switch settings on the UPS have been changed.

event.descr:
The batteries of the UPS need immediate replacement.

mtrapargsString%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: The UPS batteries require immediate replacement.

event.descr:
One of the contacts on the Measure-UPS has changed from its default position. The contact number that is faulted is: %parm[#1]%.

mtrapargsInteger%parm[#1]%

mtrapargsString%parm[#2]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: A Measure-UPS contact closure has faulted.

event.descr:
A fault on one of the Measure-UPS contacts has been resolved. The contact number that has been resolved is: %parm[#1]%.

mtrapargsInteger%parm[#1]%

mtrapargsString%parm[#2]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: A Measure-UPS contact closure has returned to it's default state.

event.descr:
UPS on bypass due to internal fault

mtrapargsString%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: The UPS is on bypass due to an internal fault.

event.descr:
UPS on bypass - user set via software or panel

mtrapargsString%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: UPS put on bypass by user via software or front UPS panel.

event.descr:
UPS on bypass - initiated by user

mtrapargsString%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: UPS put on bypass by user.

event.descr:
UPS has returned from bypass

mtrapargsString%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: The UPS has returned from bypass mode.

event.descr:
Base module bypass power supply needs repair

event.logmsg: APC Event: The base module bypass power supply needs repair.

event.descr:
Base module fan needs repair

event.logmsg: APC Event: The base module fan needs repair.

UPS is communicating with the external battery packs.

event.logmsg: APC Event: Communication established with external battery packs.

event.descr:
A battery calibration test has been initiated on the UPS.

event.logmsg: APC Event: A battery run time calibration test has been initiated.

event.descr:
Agent restarting as commanded by manager.

mtrapargsString%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: Agent restarting as commanded by manager.

event.descr:
A UPS is turned on.

mtrapargsString%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: A UPS is turned on.

event.descr:
The UPS is reducing the line voltage via Smart-AVR.

mtrapargsString%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: The UPS has enabled Smart-AVR voltage reduction.

event.descr:
Authentication on agent code image is done.

The TFTP Server: %parm[#1]% returned the value: %parm[#2]%, where (1) indicates and unknown error, (2) indicates valid new agent code, (3) means that the code imaged matched the old image, and (4) means it was an invalid code image.

mconfigTFTPServerIP%parm[#1]%

newCodeAuthentViaTFTP%parm[#2]% unknown(1) validNewAgentCodeImage(2) sameAgentCodeImage(3) invalidAgentCodeImage(4)
event.logmsg: APC Event: Authentication on agent code image is done.

The UPS has returned from Smart-AVR.

event.descr:

event.descr:
The Redundant Switch has switched source. The the current source: %parm[#1]%, where 0=A, 1=B. The name of the current source is : %parm[#2]%. The the transfer cause is: %parm[#3]%, where 0=No Tranfers Recorded, 1=Due to user action or preferred switching, 3=Due to line notch or spike, 5=Due to low line voltage, 7=Transfer due to high line voltage, 9=Transfer due to frequency out of range. The name of the transfer cause is: %parm[#4]%.

mtrapargsInteger02%parm[#1]%

mtrapargsString03%parm[#2]%

mtrapargsInteger%parm[#3]%

mtrapargsString02%parm[#4]%

mtrapargsString%parm[#5]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: The Redundant Switch has switched source.

event.descr:
The Redundant Switch has lost redundancy. The source which is no longer available is: %parm[#1]%, where 0=A, 1=B. The name of the source which is no longer available is: %parm[#2]%.

mtrapargsInteger%parm[#1]%

mtrapargsString02%parm[#2]%

mtrapargsString%parm[#3]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: The Redundant Switch has has lost redundancy.

event.descr:
Redundancy has been restored to the Redundant Switch . The source which has been restored is: %parm[#1]%, where 0=A, 1=B. The name of the source which has been restored is: %parm[#2]%.

mtrapargsInteger%parm[#1]%

mtrapargsString02%parm[#2]%

mtrapargsString%parm[#3]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: Redundancy has been restored to the Redundant Switch

A Minor alarm is no longer active in the DC power plant.

mtrapargsString%parm[#1]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: A Minor alarm is no longer active in the DC power plant.

event.descr:
An output relay for the powerplant has been activated (state changed to on). The output relay number is: %parm[#1]%, and its name is: %parm[#2]%.

dm3StatusOutRlyIndex%parm[#1]%

dm3StatusOutRlyName%parm[#2]%

mtrapargsString%parm[#3]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: An output relay has gone on in the DC power plant.

event.descr:
An output relay for the powerplant has been deactivated (state changed to off). The output relay number is: %parm[#1]%, and its name is: %parm[#2]%.

dm3StatusOutRlyIndex%parm[#1]%

dm3StatusOutRlyName%parm[#2]%

mtrapargsString%parm[#3]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: An output relay has gone off in the DC power plant.

event.descr:
An input relay for the powerplant has been activated (state changed to on). The input relay number is: %parm[#1]%, and its name is: %parm[#2]%.

dm3StatusInRlyIndex%parm[#1]%

dm3StatusInRlyName%parm[#2]%

mtrapargsString%parm[#3]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: An input relay has gone on in the DC power plant.

event.descr:
An input relay for the powerplant has been deactivated (state changed to off). The input relay number is: %parm[#1]%, and its name is: %parm[#2]%.

dm3StatusInRlyIndex%parm[#1]%

dm3StatusInRlyName%parm[#2]%

mtrapargsString%parm[#3]%
event.logmsg: APC Event: An input relay has gone off in the DC power plant.

event.descr: This is the default event format used when an enterprise specific event (trap) is received from a APC device for which no format has been configured (i.e. no event definition exists).
event.logmsg: Received unformatted enterprise event (enterprise:%id% generic:%generic% specific:%specific%). %parm[##]% args: %parm[all]%
